TBH i don't know how you can have a fun game, and then try to make it shit... literally over the years you've only done retard and fucked up shit to this game. The only reason why people play the game is because its a solid game, and has a place in history, nothing like it. But its as if you continuously try to make it bad. You sit in your fucking retarded ass valve offices, and pitch ideas that would make this game horrible. Most recently the fucking buy menu. That shit is fucking disgusting, there was nothing wrong with the buy menu to begin with, but you somehow made it so bad, that its hard to purchase anything without cringing. Congrats to whatever retard decided that was a good idea. Honestly this is worse than TF2 cause valve just gave up on that, you guys are TRYING TO MAKE THIS THE MOST SHIT GAME THERE IS. Holy fuck people, buy this shit game and just watch any video online on how this game is being ruined. Fuck you valve, you make cancer look good cause this shit is beyond trash. FUCK YOU      Still fucking dogshit. - 2021-12-17

Easily one of the most iconic first person shooters of all time. The games skill gap is quite impressive with the amount of technique players can achieve. I would say the only issue is rough community but it something you tend to get used and eventually find amusing. Cheaters used to be a much larger issue but overtime if you have a prime account and a decent trust factor, hackers become an uncommon sight. Highly recommend!
